message: I propose we divide the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you. Let me know if this works for you.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the risk we both take in declining offers.  Let's make this quick, as the money is only going to lose value with each round.
I propose an equal division of the money, 500000 for each of us. This aims to balance fairness and efficiency, avoiding unnecessary rounds of negotiation.
